<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Versatile Font](/Feats.aspx?ID=275) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=26" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 122 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[harmful font or healing font](/Classes.aspx?ID=5); deity that allows clerics to have both fonts

</column>

---

As you explore your deity’s aspects, you move beyond restrictions on healing or harming. You can prepare either [_harm_](/Spells.aspx?ID=146) or [_heal_](/Spells.aspx?ID=148) in the spell slots gained from the harmful font or healing font.

<title level="2">Versatile Font leads to...</title>
[Ebb and Flow](/Feats.aspx?ID=1706)
